alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Kaibab Plateau; Northern Gila County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 2:38PM MST until February 23 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Fredonia, Ganado, Jacob Lake, Payson, Pine-Strawberry, Pinetop-Lakeside, Shonto, Show Low, Whiteriver and Window Rock. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 5 PM Tuesday to 6 PM Wednesday: Alpine 1 to 3 inches Buffalo Pass 4 to 6 inches Fredonia 4 to 8 inches Ganado 3 to 5 inches Jacob Lake 4 to 8 inches Payson 6 to 10 inches Pine-Strawberry 9 to 15 inches Pinetop-Lkside 6 to 10 inches Shonto 2 to 4 inches Show Low 6 to 10 inches Whiteriver 4 to 6 inches Window Rock 3 to 5 inches North Rim 7 to 11 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Kaibab Plateau; Northern Gila County; White Mountains
